name: GameTober Compil - By Lapin Lambda [Day 10]
description:
Hello ! I am LeLapinLambda and I am currently working on the Inktober challenge, but developing a game every day.

I propose today a version of the first 11 days, so the first 11 games already made.
Sorry, this game compilation is not available in English currently. But do not worry, there is not much text.
